parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Dynamic Simulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets activation distance multiplier of [[Arma_3_Dynamic_Simulation]] for the given class

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> class '''setDynamicSimulationDistanceCoef''' multiplier

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  class: [[String]] - Multiplier class, currently only:
* <tt>"IsMoving"</tt> - Multiplies the entity activation distance by set value if the entity is moving. Default: 2
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  multiplier: [[Number]] - Distance multiplier

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"IsMoving" [[setDynamicSimulationDistanceCoef]] 3;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[enableDynamicSimulationSystem]], [[dynamicSimulationSystemEnabled]], [[enableDynamicSimulation]], [[dynamicSimulationEnabled]], [[setDynamicSimulationDistance]], [[dynamicSimulationDistance]], [[dynamicSimulationDistanceCoef]], [[triggerDynamicSimulation]], [[canTriggerDynamicSimulation]], [[enableSimulation]], [[simulationEnabled]], [[enableSimulationGlobal]], [[Arma_3_Dynamic_Simulation]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
